sentences.english: And so, we will see you if I time this correctly on Wednesday.
and then absolutely nothing on Fridays. But on Wednesdays,
sentences.chinese: 然後週五完全沒課。但是在週三，

sentences.english: I don’t remember much of Thursday.
sentences.chinese: 那個週三的事我已經記得不大清楚了。

sentences.english: Tomasz Kuszczak, meanwhile, is expected to receive a run-out against Wolverhampton Wanderers in the Carling Cup tomorrow night.
sentences.chinese: 同時，庫什薩克也將在週三的聯賽盃上得到出場機會。

sentences.english: However, those credentials are not likely to lead to victory in Wednesday's vote.
sentences.chinese: 然而，這些政績不大可能使其在週三的選舉中獲勝。

sentences.english: I'll be attending Financial Training on this Wed , this Fri and next Wed.
sentences.chinese: 我會在本週三，五和下週三參加財務培訓。

sentences.english: In the middle of the week, you get one asking what you’re up to this weekend.
sentences.chinese: 週三四時，你收到一條短信，問你週末有什麼打算。

sentences.english: I've read two books this week and it's only Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 這周纔到週三，我就讀了兩本書。

sentences.english: Thursday, the new draft regulations were released on monopoly prices.
sentences.chinese: 週三，公佈了新的壟斷價格法草案。

sentences.english: He was awaiting arraignment last night.
sentences.chinese: 週三晚間他在等待傳訊。

sentences.english: And Monday and Tuesday offer you lots of time to be alone together.
sentences.chinese: 週三和週四，你會有很多金點子哦。

sentences.english: This week's Intermediate Class will be postponed to next week!
sentences.chinese: 本週中級班因故暫停一週，下週三繼續上課。

sentences.english: When the draw is made for home and away games, we get away ones on Wednesdays.
sentences.chinese: 當抽籤決定主客場時，我們在週三都被抽中客場比賽。

sentences.english: where I would have, I think four classes one after the other on Wednesdays.
sentences.chinese: 在那一段時間，我在週三會連續上四節課。

sentences.english: Unlike in previous cases, no bottle or canister was found.
sentences.chinese: 和以往案件不同，週三並沒有瓶子或罐子被找到。

definition: competition schedule/the course of a race

pinyin: Wei2 duo1 li4 ya4 Gong1 yuan2
